statements: SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, energy_efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, energy_efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, energy_efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating > 3.5 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, energy_efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, energy_efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating < 3.0 ORDER BY energy_efficiency_rating ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT name, range, brand FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT id, name, range, efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE range >= '200 miles';
SELECT name, brand, efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand = 'Tesla';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_ratings ORDER BY overall_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand='Tesla';
SELECT id, name, range FROM electric_vehicles WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) AS no_of_vehicles FROM electric_vehicles GROUP BY brand HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT ev.name, vr.overall_rating, vr.design_rating FROM electric_vehicles ev INNER JOIN vehicle_ratings vr ON ev.id = vr.vehicle_id WHERE vr.overall_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY vr.design_rating DESC;
SELECT brand, AVG(range) AS avg_range FROM electric_vehicles GROUP BY brand HAVING AVG(range) > 200;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT model_name, brand FROM electric_vehicles WHERE efficiency_rating > 3.5;
SELECT id, location, availability FROM charging_stations ORDER BY voltage DESC;
SELECT brand, model_name, efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand = 'Tesla';
SELECT * FROM consumer_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand = 'Tesla';
SELECT model_name, efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE efficiency_rating > 3.5 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) as num_vehicles FROM electric_vehicles GROUP BY brand HAVING num_vehicles > 1 ORDER BY num_vehicles DESC;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE voltage > 400 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT model_name, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM electric_vehicles e JOIN consumer_reviews cr ON e.id = cr.vehicle_id GROUP BY model_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT id, model, brand FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_efficiency_rating > 3;
SELECT model, brand FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY model DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE available_connectors >= 5;
SELECT * FROM consumer_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT model, brand FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE charging_speed = 'Fast';
SELECT id, review_text, rating FROM consumer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT station_name, location, available_connectors FROM charging_stations WHERE available_connectors > 5;
SELECT brand, model, energy_efficiency_rating FROM electric_vehicles JOIN vehicle_specifications ON electric_vehicles.id = vehicle_specifications.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, price FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_rating > 4;
SELECT vehicle_name, price FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, energy_rating FROM electric_vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT vehicle_name, price FROM electric_vehicles WHERE price BETWEEN 20000 AND 40000;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_rating > 80 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, price FROM electric_vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, price FROM electric_vehicles WHERE energy_rating BETWEEN 50 AND 70;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, r.energy_rating, r.safety_rating FROM electric_vehicles v JOIN ratings r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id;
SELECT u.user_name, u.review_text, v.vehicle_name FROM user_reviews u JOIN electric_vehicles v ON u.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE u.review_id < 100;
